title: IlluminationWavelengthRange
description: This element records a range of Wavelengths at which this Light Source emits, according to the Manufacturer. Multiple of this element may be used.

subCategoriesOrder.IlluminationWavelengthRange: This element records a range of Wavelengths at which this Light Source emits, according to the Manufacturer. Multiple of this element may be used.

IlluminationPower.description: This field records the nominal Power output emitted at Peak Wavelength by this Light Source as advertised by the Manufacturer.

PeakWavelength.description: This field records the Wavelength associated with the peak response rate of this device.

CutOn.description: CutOn is the Wavelength below which the response rate is below 50%.

CutOff.description: CutOff is the Wavelength above which the response rate is below 50%.

WavelengthProfileFile.description: This element consists of a file containing the Wavelength profile of this hardware component.

items.description: This element consists of a file containing the Wavelength profile of this hardware component.

ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this element.

Namespace.description: We recommend the inclusion of a namespace for annotations you define. If it is absent then we assume the annotation is to use our (OME's) default interpretation for this type.

Annotator.description: The Annotator is the person who attached this annotation.e.g. If UserA annotates something with TagB, owned by UserB, UserA is still the Annotator.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
